name: metal-data
description: Modern REST API Library for Typescript

scripts.push: npm run docs && git add --all && git commit -m "Docs" && git push
scripts.patch: npm run prepublish && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && npm run push
scripts.minor: npm run prepublish && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && npm run push
scripts.major: npm run prepublish && npm version major && npm publish --access public && npm run push

author: Nanang Mahdaen El Agung <mahdaen@gmail.com>
